body.name: Car Vacuum, Portable Vacuum Cleaner with Powerful 8000Pa Suction, DC 12V High Power 16.4Ft Cord Wired Vacuum for Car, LED Light & Low Noise, Car Accessories for Men/Women

features: Powerful Car Cleaning: The car vacuum utilizes a high-power motor that can offer up to 8000pa strong suction, which terminates any dirt, debris, dog hair, soil, sand or crumbs. The built-in LED light illuminates dark places, such as under car seat, which makes corner cleaning easier.

Versatile Cleaning Accessories: The handheld car vacuum is equipped with multi-cleaning tools meet all your car cleaning needs, which are dusting brush, crevice nozzle and extendable hose that suit for cleaning all the car interiors as seats, console, dash, door or hard-to-reach corners. Note: The two connectors are integrated on one side of the hose, it needs to detach them. About how to fix the extendable hose, please refer to the picture of Product Description.

Wired Vacuum with Ultra-Long Cord: Just plug the DC 12V power cord into the car cigarette lighter and switch the power button, then cleaning begins! The Wired vacuum cleaner adopts 16.4ft long power cord, which can support to reach even the car trunk and do the whole car cleaning efficiently. It only supports plugging into car cigarette lighter, not work with other outlets.

Upgraded HEAP Filter: Our hand vacuum cleaner features improved HEPA filter that enables the vacuum cleaner to filter dust during cleaning effectively. Extra 2 filters are attached, which are removable and washable. Included a little brush to swipe the dust off the filter.

Lightweight & Compatible with All Cars: The portable car vacuum adopts ergonomic design and is lightweight at 1.75 pounds, a simple one-hand operation to quickly clean your car. Our hand held vacuum suits all cars, trucks, vans and SUVs with car cigarette lighter. Perfect gift for your lovers to enjoy a neat and tidy car experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Professional DC 12V High Power Car Vacuum Cleaner DRECELL Powerful car vacuum with an efficient motor creates 8000pa strong suction to clean dust, stains, cigarette ash,pet hair and debris.

Long Power Cord The 16.4ft power cord plugs into the car’s 12V lighter port that can cover the trunk of your car. It's suitable for sedan, truck, mini, Jeep and more. Ultra Lightweight Only weighs 1.71bs, which can clean your car by one hand, long time holding without tired. Ideal for clean your car with family trip. Low Noise The noise level of this car vacuum is less than 75dB, does not disturb your child's sleep or scare your lovely pet 我很. Enjoying the quiet cleaning experience.

Anti-rubbish Drop Baffle There is a black circular flipper at the entrance of the car vacuum which prevents debris fall out of the vacuum cup. Perfect for store it anywhere to not worry make it messy. 2 * HEAP Filter Two detachable and washable HEAP filters make your vacuum much easier to clean and more durable. Note: Please install the filter after dried when washing it. Package Includes: 1 * Portable Car Vacuum 1 * Cleaning Brush 1 * Crevice Nozzle 1 * Blowing Hose/2 * Connector 2 * HEAP Fliter/1 * Little Brush 1 * Handheld Storage Bag

Handheld Car Vacuum with multifunctional accessories for all-around car cleaning, more versatile usage Crevice Nozzle Our portable car vacuum with a crevice nozzle helps to clean seat cracks and bust dust in air vents. Cleaning Brush Perfect for dealing with pet hair,sand on the car seat carpet, makes your car feel like new with the cleaning brush. Extension Tube It can connect the Brush and Crevice Nozzle to reach under seats and other hard-to-reach areas, which performs high flexibility.

How to connect the brush nozzle or crevice nozzle with the extension tube? 1. There are two connectors that are connected together on one side of the extension tube. Please take apart them and install another connector to the other side of the extension tube. 2. The two connectors are divided into one small and one big port. For the small one, connect it to the vacuum host. 3. For the big one, connect it to the brush nozzle or crevice nozzle with the extension tube. Note: Please kindly find the two connectors on one side of the extension tube and take apart them.

Simple Steps to Clean the Portable Car Vacuum, Easy and Effective! Tips for using the Car Vacuum Cleaner: Please note that the host of vacuum cannot touch water to prevent liquids from entering the fan to be damaged. After cleaning, keep the accessories dried before installation. Proper cleaning way makes the handheld car vacuum cleaner have more powerful suction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Powerful
reviews.reviewText: As someone who takes pride in maintaining a clean and tidy car, I recently had the opportunity to use this powerful car vacuum. The experience was nothing short of impressive, and I feel I should share my thoughts on this handy device.Firstly, the suction power of this vacuum is its standout feature. I was not expecting this: it easily handles a variety of messes from dirt to crumbs. This level of efficiency is particularly noteworthy in a vacuum of its size. The additional LED light is a thoughtful touch, illuminating dark areas like under the car seats, making it easier to ensure a thorough clean.The vacuum comes equipped with a range of versatile cleaning accessories, including a dusting brush, a crevice nozzle, and an extendable hose. These tools are incredibly handy, allowing for comprehensive cleaning of all interior areas like seats, the console, dash, doors, and those hard-to-reach corners.One of the most convenient aspects of this vacuum is its 'plug and play' feature. Simply plug the power cord into the car's cigarette lighter, switch it on, and you're ready to go. The length of the cord is sufficient to reach even the farthest corners of the car, including the trunk, ensuring a thorough cleaning without the need for constant unplugging and moving.The HEPA filter is another significant feature. It effectively filters dust, enhancing the cleaning process. The inclusion of two extra removable and washable filters, along with a brush for dusting off the filter, is a practical addition, ensuring the vacuum's longevity and consistent performance.In conclusion, this car vacuum is a remarkable blend of power, versatility, and convenience. It's a must-have for anyone who values a clean car interior and seeks an efficient, easy-to-use cleaning solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler-Tested, Parent-Approved Cleanup Companion
reviews.reviewText: As a parent of a perpetually messy toddler, maintaining a clean car interior has been an ongoing challenge. Enter this compact and powerful car vacuum, a true game-changer in the world of on-the-go cleanliness.First and foremost, the suction power of this little wonder exceeded my expectations. Despite its small size, it effortlessly tackles everything from toddler crumbs to the remnants of on-the-road snacks. The additional LED light is a thoughtful touch, shedding light on those hidden corners where messes love to hide, making cleanup a breeze.The variety of cleaning accessories, including a dusting brush, a crevice nozzle, and an cleaning brush, make this vacuum incredibly versatile. From car seats to the console and the doors, every nook and cranny can be easily reached and cleaned with precision.The 'plug and play' feature is a busy parent's dream. With a power cord that reaches even the farthest corners of my SUV, I can seamlessly vacuum the entire interior without the hassle of constantly unplugging and repositioning. Perfect for those times when my toddler decides the backseat is the ideal place for an impromptu snack.The inclusion of a HEPA filter is a game-changer, especially for parents concerned about the air quality inside the car. Two extra washable filters and a brush for dusting off the filter add to the convenience, ensuring the vacuum's performance remains consistent over time.What sets this car vacuum apart is the thoughtful addition of a handy bag for storage. As a parent, I appreciate the simplicity of having everything neatly organized and ready to go whenever needed. No more fumbling around for loose attachments; it's all in one place, making the process of keeping my car tidy that much easier.This vacuum has already paid for itself in the convenience it brings. No more trips to the carwash or gas station just for a quick cleanup. With a toddler in tow, having this portable powerhouse on hand is a sanity-saver. It's lightweight, efficient, and the go-to solution for anyone seeking a quick and effective way to maintain a clean car interior. Highly recommended! 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the DRECELL Car Vacuum and it’s a game-changer for cleaning my car and camper.The suction power is amazing - it effortlessly picks up dirt, dust, and debris from every nook and cranny in my car and camper. It leaves them looking spotless and well-maintained.The 16.4ft cord is a fantastic feature, providing ample reach to clean all corners of my vehicles without any limitations. The DC 12V high power ensures that the vacuum operates efficiently.The LED light is especially handy during nighttime cleaning or in shaded parking areas.It operates quietly, allowing me to clean my car without causing a disturbance.It is a must-have car accessory. Its powerful suction, long cord, LED light, and low noise level make it a top-tier portable vacuum cleaner. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and efficient tool to keep their vehicle interiors impeccably clean.Bonus - it also came with a carrying bag which is very convenient! Love that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this car vacuum.
reviews.reviewText: I love so much about this vacuum so far. It comes with a decent carrying case, long cord, and has a light so you can see where you are vacuuming. It is also light and easy to empty. The attachments are an added bonus. It also comes with an extra filter. As far as cleaning power it does a good job cleaning and picked the dirt and debris well off the carpets with ease. While it's not as strong as industrial vacuums, it gets the job done and has impressive suction for it's size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing car vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: This is vacuum is exactly what you need, it's affordable and does a great job 👍. It's attachments help with cleaning all throught the car even in hard to reach places. I like how it has an extra filter so just in case you're cleaning the first one, you have a second one to replace it. It also comes in a nice compact bag to help keep the vacuum and attachments organized.
